name: Amazon Elasticsearch Service
short: A fully managed service on AWS that makes it easy to deploy, secure, operate, and scale Elasticsearch clusters in the cloud.
description: Amazon Elasticsearch Service is a fully managed service that makes it easy to deploy, secure, and operate Elasticsearch at scale. It provides real-time, distributed search and analytics, and can be used for log and event data analysis, full-text search, application monitoring, and more. It supports open-source Elasticsearch APIs, tools, and clients. It offers seamless scaling, automated backups, and integrated security, thus simplifying the management of Elasticsearch clusters, allowing developers to focus on innovation.
